g.text: Pocket 3 legged with Aniapi
User
Server
Pocket
Aniapi
user open the browser and visit the root webpage(localhost:3000/)
send 200 OK back to user and return a html form for user to fill out
fill out the form(enter a random number),
send the request to the webpage(localhost:3000/aniapi)
later we need to redirect to another webpage,
so we can't really pass the input number when
I need to use it later, so I decide to store it in a new array number[]
send a request in POST method,method url is 'https:
getpocket.com/v3/oauth/request'
so that we can get the request_token from pocket
send 200 OK back and also with the request_token that we need
later we need to redirect to another webpage,
so we can't really pass the request_token when
we need to use it for later steps,so I decide to
store in into a new array called info[]
send 302 Redirect with pocket to user for the later authorization.
when received 302,browser will automaticlly go to the authorization webpage for pocket
require user to login if didn't do it yet;ask user for the permission for the app from pocket
if user didn't login in with their account for pocket,login in first; then confirm the permission for the app from pocket
redirect to the webpage we set for it(localhost:3000/redirect)
when the webpage for the redirection appears, the function to get
access_token will execute
send a POST method request with the consumer_key and code,the endpoint is 'https:
getpocket.com/v3/oauth/authorize'
send 200 OK and also with the access_token back
Because we already have an array info[] which has the code;then we can also store the access_token from the previous step,
so that we can use it later
send a GET method request to aniapi with the input number, the endpoint is 'https:
api.aniapi.com/v1/random/anime/number/false'
(here number is the input number)
send 200 OK and also with a JSON list
I only need the urls for the cover image for the animes,so I create a new array called cover_urls[];
then I first parse the json list and take out the urls from it.Lastly store them into the cover_urls
send a POST method request to pocket with the consumer_key,access_token and action(cover_urls);
the endpoint is 'https:
getpocket.com/v3/send'
send 200 OK back to the server
set a redirection url to the user's mylist page in pocket,the url is 'https:
app.getpocket.com/'
send 302 Redirect to redirection url which we set from the previous step
when received the 302, the browser will automaticlly go to the webpage
send 200 OK to user
alt
[get request_token from pocket]
alt
[redirection and authorization]
alt
[get access_token from pocket]
alt
[send request to aniapi to get random anime back]
alt
[add the urls into user's pocket account]
